A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After some time to digest The Last Jedi\, it may be almost as good as the Empire Strikes Back.  At first I didn't like the film's take on Luke\, but as the movie progressed and more of the back story was revealed  I understood the director's take on him.  I may need to see it again to pick up on all of the \"call backs\" in the movie.
